hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that they suffered from hunger and they were seven. He said:“Then the Prophet (ﷺ) gave me seven dates, one date for each man.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَعِيشَةِ أَصْحَابِ النَّبِيِّ ـ صلى الله عليه وسلم ـ
chapter.eng-name: The livelihood of the companions of the Prophet (ﷺ)
